Dagmar Havlová (amụrụ ya na ónws 22 Machị 1953) ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Czech
Ọ lụrụ Václav Havel, onye bụbu onye isi ala Czech, na Jenụwarị 4, 1997
O mụtara otu nwa nwanyị, Nina Rusikrnová (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1976), site n'alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na Radvít Novák (1975-1980).
A mụrụ Havlová n'aka Markéta Turnová na onye na-eme nkwekọrịta Karel Turnkrna na 22 Machị 1953 na Brno
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Brno Conservatory na 1971
N'afọ 1975, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na utu aha nke a na apụ"Magister artis" (nke ya na Master of Fine Arts) site na Janáček Academy of Musical Arts.
Ọ pụtara ihe karịrị 50 na ónụ ógogo fim na 200 na telivishọn.
Servare na Manere: Enyi nke Udo
Kemgbe afọ 2020 ọ ghọrọ onye enyi udo nke International Tree of Peace Project nakwa onye nlekọta nke Czech Republic.
